Here's a gender-neutral description that avoids gendered language:

The Amazon Essentials Boys and Toddlers' Fleece Pullover Hoodie Sweatshirts are a great choice for everyday wear. Made of a comfortable blend of 60% cotton and 40% polyester, these sweatshirts feature a kangaroo pocket and elastic ribbing at the cuffs and hem. They are machine washable for easy care.

Amazon Essentials offers affordable and high-quality everyday clothing for kids. Their line includes cozy fleeces, warm puffer jackets, and school uniform-ready pants and polo shirts. Consistent sizing makes it easy to shop, and every piece is put to the test to meet high standards of quality and comfort.

By avoiding gendered language and focusing on the product features and benefits, this description can appeal to all parents who are looking for comfortable and durable clothing for their children.
